enWisdom: The cause of enmity is lack of empathy [and consideration for others]
Too much enmity is disquieting for the hearts
Whoever stubbornly opposes the people, they hate him
Whoever insults [and disputes with] the people, his enemies increase

Wisdom: مَنْ سَلَّ سَيْفَ الْعُدْوَانِ قُتِلَ بِهِ
enWisdom: One who unsheathes the sword of aggression is killed by it

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَحْلَى مُعَادَاةَ الرِّجَالِ اسْتَمَرَّ مُعَانَاةَ الْقِتَالِ
enWisdom: One who finds the enmity of men sweet tastes the bitterness of the hardships of war
One who shows enmity towards the people reaps the fruit of regret

Wisdom: مَوَاقِفُ الشَّنَئَانِ تُسْخِطُ الرَّحْمَنَ وَتُرْضِي الشَّيْطَانَ وَتَشِينُ الْإِنْسَانَ
enWisdom: Stances of [enmity and] hatred anger the Most Merciful, please Satan and disgrace man

Wisdom: لَا تَحَاسَدُوا فَإِنَّ الْحَسَدَ يَأْكُلُ الْإِيمَانَ كَمَا تَأْكُلُ النَّارُ الْحَطَبَ وَلَا تَبَاغَضُوا فَإِنَّهَا الْحَالِقَةُ [المحالقة]
enWisdom: Do not be jealous of each other, for jealousy eats away the faith like fire consumes firewood; and do not have hatred for one another for this is severing [for the faith]

Wisdom: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَنْ يَتَّقِيَ اللَّهَ مَنْ خَاصَمَ
enWisdom: He who has animosity [towards others] is not capable of fearing Allah
